meanings.definition: To equip with a conveyor system.
meanings.sent1: The factory started conveyorizing its production line for efficiency.
meanings.sent2: They are conveyorizing the warehouse to streamline the movement of goods.
meanings.sent3: The robots were excited about conveyorizing their work area.
meanings.sent4: The idea of conveyorizing the entire distribution center was like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: Conveyorizing the packaging process made it look like a smoothly flowing river.

meanings.definition: To automate a process using conveyors.
meanings.sent1: The company is conveyorizing the assembly line to speed up production.
meanings.sent2: We are conveyorizing the shipping department to reduce manual labor.
meanings.sent3: The idea of conveyorizing the kitchen to serve food faster was a hit.
meanings.sent4: Conveyorizing the document sorting saved a lot of time like magic.
meanings.sent5: The concept of conveyorizing the checkout process was a game-changer for the store.
